rooms.description: Large entrance with a small waiting area aligned to the east as per Vastu principles.
Spacious living room centrally located for social gatherings; large windows on south facing side for natural light and ventilation.
Dining area adjacent to the kitchen with east-west orientation in line with Vastu recommendations.
Well-equipped kitchen located on north side for positive energy; equipped with modern appliances and ventilation system.
Two bedrooms on the ground floor; each with a spacious balcony facing south for privacy and sunlight.
Main bathroom adjacent to living room area; features water closet and sink; design aligns with Vastu principles regarding sanitation areas.
Central courtyard providing ventilation and natural light, acting as a transitional space between the house and the terrace.

openings.description: Large windows for ample natural light, placed according to Vastu guidelines (south and east orientations).
Balconies with railings overlooking the courtyard.

additional_features.description: A spacious rooftop terrace accessible via a staircase in the central corridor; designed for relaxation and gatherings.
The house is structured as a duplex, with distinct living areas on each level. Ground floor houses more public spaces while first floor focuses on private living and bedrooms.
